meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #836.

td.p: Johanna Pick, a photographer from Los Angeles, California
Bob Sutton, an environmental chemist from Gainesville, Florida
Cynthia Heller, an office manager from Hatboro, Pennsylvania

tr.td: ART
BACTERIA
TRUMAN SPEAKS
STATISTICS
SEA SONGS
VOCABULARY

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_3', 'clue_DJ_5_3_stuck', '(Alex: Cynthia?)
(Cynthia: Oh, what is red?)
(Alex: Oh, you\'re on the right track, but you forgot the second part of the clue. Palindrome, has to be spelled the same backwards and forwards. [*]. Comparative, comparative. Okay, that cost you a thou; you start building.)

redder

Cynthia
')

(Cynthia: What is Florida & California?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Cynthia: What is [*]?)

Disneyworld & Disneyland

CynthiaJohanna
')
